thread.title: Solomon Asante: I want to be part of the history of TP Mazembe
thread.title_full: Solomon Asante: I want to be part of the history of TP Mazembe

title: Solomon Asante: I want to be part of the history of TP Mazembe
text:
Sports News | 7 October 2015 21:55 CET Solomon Asante: I want to be part of the history of TP Mazembe - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana and TP Mazembe winger Solomon Asante 
Ghana and TP Mazembe winger Solomon Asante says he is itching to win the CAF Champions league with TP Mazembe and make history. 
The Ravens are looking for their fifth CAF Champions League trophy when they take on Algerian side USM Algers. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us He is no fool who gives what he cannot keep to gain what he cannot lose By: John Boadi
